ctx: intros m z n p i Hmap Hexd Hiter.
exceptions.tactic: replace (i + n * p) with (n * p + i) by lia.
exceptions.exn: The reference lia was not found in the current environment.

original: intros m z n p i Hmap Hexd Hiter. unfold Iter. replace (i + n * p) with (n * p + i) by lia. apply Iter_plus with (z:=z). - auto. - auto. - apply Iter_mult; auto.
